attributes.action: Jobs For UK Residents Before Imigrants
attributes.additional_details:
More Jobs To Go To Britsh Born Residents, Rather To Imigrants ( Legal or Otherwise)
We The People Of Britain Would Like A Fair And Equal Chance To Seek Full Or Part Time Emplyment And Employers Should Look To Hire British Born Or Those Born In The U.K (England, Scotland, Wales And Northern Ireland) And Should Be Prioritised For Housing And Work Over Imigrants
